name: Hotline Phone Ring
author: Nam Truong

sections.description:
Fixed Hotline on the screen.

From within WordPress

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Hotline Phone Ring’
  3. Activate Hotline Phone Ring from your Plugins page.

Manually

  1. Upload the hotline-phone-ring folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Hotline Phone Ring plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to “after activation” below.

Others Plugins

Yes we do plugins and we’ve got some popular ones ðŸ™‚

Main plugins from Nam Truong:

  • Slider Hero with Elementor: Create unlimited beautiful sliders with Elementor Page Builder.
  • WooCommerce For Elementor: Add new Woocommerce Widgets that are specifically designed to be used in conjunction with the Elementor Page Builder.
  • Better Categories Images: The Better Categories Images Plugin allow you to add image with any category or taxonomy.
sections.faq: You’ll find answers to many of your questions on (https://namncn.com/plugins/hotline-phone-ring/).
